message: This seems to be a neat spot for fishing.
You cast your fishing rod and have to wait now.
Unfortunately, you don't have a fishing rod.

North: Guynmart
East: Moeston
South: Feygard river control station
The way through seems to be too tough.
Are you sure you are supposed to be here?
We have an eye on you.
Chrrrr...
I hate that dog... his barks scare me.
I hope Olec will station me somewhere else...
Can't I just leave my position and... never come back?
Grrr...
[Barks loudly]
Ahh! Go away!
What a funny daaay!
Oh what a vieeew from up hereee...
Oh, Officer! Yes, I am doing my work. No worries.

replies.text: Am I not a bit too small to be the Officer?

message: Haha! You are right. You are very small Officer!
Speak to the Officer!
Ah! Don't you scare me like that!
Shh! Don't reveal my hiding spot.
Uh, nothing. No. I'm nobody at all.
And you don't know me nor have you seen me.

replies.text: Ah, I see. You can trust me.

message: Yes, I've heard about you. Anyways, do you want to trade?
Right. If I get the chance, I'll be out of here soon. Be careful when you leave.
Hey, you, do you want to trade?
[You notice an interesting looking piece of paper]
[The report is still there]
[You quickly look around to make sure nobody is watching]

To: General Ettenhal, Feygard
From: Officer Olec, River Control Guynmart
[This seems to be none of your business]

I am reporting an encounter with the urgent need of further investigation.
During a regular boat control, a young man had carried a substantial amount of banned potions. We could confiscate his belongings, but the suspect quickly fled the vicinity.
The following list displays a summary of important items the suspect had carried:
- Bonemeal Potions, 25 bottles
- Bonemeal, 20 bags

- A piece of paper with the following text:

"We await your arrival with pleasure. 25 and 20. Watch out for guards."

Adressed to: Andor
[A slight shiver goes down your spine. Andor was here?]
Hey! What are you doing?

replies.text: Uhm, nothing... I... lost my teddy bear somewhere.
I... I have wondered if you... could use some help, yes.

message: You better leave this place and go back to mummy!
Help? Haha, look, kid. We are Soldiers from Feygard. You're just a kid. How do you imagine helping us?

replies.text: Hey, I just solved a conflict at the other castle over there. So why should this one be a problem?

message: Oh, you have. Hmpf, speak to the Officer then. He is over there. (Points towards the other tower)
No, no. Better leave this case to us soldiers.
Whom has torned mine such beautiful land apart that myself has owneth? Ye shall suffer in paiiin!
*whistles a melody*

replies.text: Have you seen my brother, Andor?

message: There was a boy here not long ago, but I don't know if he is the one you are searching.
Oh it is wonderful! I just found the perfect spot to catch rasbora, a rare type only living here in this river.

replies.text: That sounds nice! Do you mind selling me one of them?

message: I am sorry, I have brought all I had to the market. I could try and catch one for you, but I am all out of bait.

replies.text: Too bad. Maybe I'll visit the market later.
Maybe I can get you more bait.

message: Oh you would? Sure, but I do not know where to get it.

replies.text: Huh, why that? You are a fisherman after all.

message: Look, those rasbora require a special bait. They don't bite with regular ones.
It is small spider larvae. An adventurer once sold me a bag full.
I don't know if you can find him, but he came from and went back to the east.

replies.text: No, this sounds too complicated. I have better things to do right now.
I am not sure, but I am willing to search for him.
No problem for me. I'll do it!

message: Well, no bait, no fish. But come back if you ever find some!
Great! Please head to the east. I remember the adventurer talking about a cave ore something. Maybe look out for that.
Also take the empty bag. Carrying dead spiders is easier with this.
Well, I am all out of bait.

replies.text: I am still searching for it.
I've got a bag full of bait for you.

message: Good. Please come back if you found it.
Oh, wonderful! Yes... very nice...
I... look, I am tired of fishing with this rod. It has always been a dream of mine to get a boat and fish with one of those giant nets.
I sold all the fish on the market and am now hoping to be able to buy a boat and a net.

replies.text: So... you are giving up your neat little spot here?
No, wait! You wanted to catch me a rasbora!

message: Yes. I know, it's not an easy decision for me either. But I am leaving very soon towards Remgard.

replies.text: Oh no, but what about your stuff?

message: Just follow the river east. It's an island located in the big Lake Laeroth.
Here, take this. I don't need it anymore. If you want, you can try and catch your own fish now.
It is very easy. Just stand right here next to the water and cast the rod. Fish will come right up to you. If you pull out the rod in the right moment, you will catch them.
I know it takes some practise and it won't work right away, but you'll figure it out.
I have to go now. But if you ever visit Remgard, we will meet each other again. Farewell my friend!
[Niel stares at the bag of bait you gave him]
This is no place for you kid. You better stay out of here.
Yes, this boy fled towards east. Somebody should check that.
Wha... oh, definetely not you. It's none of your business little kid.

replies.text: I am searching for a boy already. Maybe I could help you find your boy too.

message: None of your business! Now get out.
Is the letter to Feygard ready?
Wha... oh, I wasn't speaking to you, kid. Forget what I said.
Where is this guy? I'll rebuke him.
Wha... oh, not you little kid. I am talking about one of my soldiers.
Only an hour till shift is over...
*yawn* Oh, kid! This is no place to be. We are very busy right now.
Working with those old mattocks is tiring...
Look how beautiful the salads are growing!
May this old man not work in peace, without getting disturbed all the time?
Oh how I long for some rasbora... what a tasty fish that was...
Please let me work in peace.
The sun is shining beautifully today. I hope the clothes are drying fast before it rains again.
And guess what he did!
What? Tell me!
Quietly and secretly, he simply cut down her favourite tree.
No way! Lynn must have been so angry.
Oh she was! But she didn't stand long for that. Jagor must have commisioned some new robes already.
What did she do to it?
I heard she has sewn them slightly too tight for him.
That's too funny! Oh but did you hear about her daughter?
Lina? No.
Yes, yes, she told me that she played a trick on Teranir!
Oh poor Teranir, haha. What did she do?
She said that when Teranir was in the basement, she went to the altar and poured some mead into the holy water!
Haha, yes! Did she get caught?
No, that's the best part. Okay, get ready for it.
I am!
Teranir suspects Betty for it!
Oh no, poor Betty! Wait, does that have something to do with the inn the last days?
Why, what happened?
I heard some guests have slept poorly the past few nights.
Oh you think Teranir has...
Yes, a curse! He put a curse over the inn!
How could he do that! That is horrible!
You've said it! And I have also been listening to the merchants over there. They are furious because there are less travellers and they don't want to buy anything.
Sure! If I get bad sleep, I'm not in a mood for shopping.
Correct! Teranir is ruining our town!
But don't you also think those merchants are up to something?
Oh I'm glad you said it. I have a queasy feeling as well.
Yes, they never leave their spot, always keeping an eye on the square...
What if they are planning something bad... like... kidnapping...
[Gasp] Oh! They are kidnapping our beautiful children! We cannot let that happen!
No! Let's tell the prison guard to put them under arrest before anything bad happens!
Wait... have you seen him lately?
Oh right, I haven't! What's going on?
Didn't we have a prisoner? But I haven't seen him yesterday when I went for a walk down there.
We are in danger! This guy is on the loose! How could he escape?
Wait, don't you think Fanamor has a hand in it? He was a friend of this prisoner if I am not mistaken.
Yes, you are right! Fanamor also built the jail bars, he knows for sure how to break them open.
How dare Fanamor! Now our town is even more in danger!
Oh but speaking of Fanamor, how is his wife doing? Haven't seen her lately.
Enila, yes, oh there is a story...
Tell me!
Yes, she had a dispute with Lynn the other day.
Oh Enila and Lynn, they are always at loggerheads.
Yes, yes, and Fanamor was very unhappy about Enila.
I can imagine!
And guess what he did!
What? Tell me!
Quietly and secretly, he simply cut down her favourite tree.
No way! Lynn must have been so angry.
Oh she was! But she didn't stand long for that. Jagor must have commisioned some new robes already.
What did she do to it?
I heard she has sewn them slightly too tight for him.
That's too funny! Oh but did you hear about her daughter?
Lina? No.
Yes, yes, she told me that she played a trick on Teranir!
Oh poor Teranir, haha. What did she do?
She said that when Teranir was in the basement, she went to the altar and poured some mead into the holy water!
Haha, yes! Did she get caught?
No, that's the best part. Okay, get ready for it.
I am!
Teranir suspects Betty for it!
Oh no, poor Betty! Wait, does that have something to do with the inn the last days?
Why, what happened?
I heard some guests have slept poorly the past few nights.
Oh you think Teranir has...
Yes, a curse! He put a curse over the inn!
How could he do that! That is horrible!
You've said it! And I have also been listening to the merchants over there. They are furious because there are less travellers and they don't want to buy anything.
Sure! If I get bad sleep, I'm not in a mood for shopping.
Correct! Teranir is ruining our town!
But don't you also think those merchants are up to something?
Oh I'm glad you said it. I have a queasy feeling as well.
Yes, they never leave their spot, always keeping an eye on the square...
What if they are planning something bad... like... kidnapping...
[Gasp] Oh! They are kidnapping our beautiful children! We cannot let that happen!
No! Let's tell the prison guard to put them under arrest before anything bad happens!
Wait... have you seen him lately?
Oh right, I haven't! What's going on?
Didn't we have a prisoner? But I haven't seen him yesterday when I went for a walk down there.
We are in danger! This guy is on the loose! How could he escape?
Wait, don't you think Fanamor has a hand in it? He was a friend of this prisoner if I am not mistaken.
Yes, you are right! Fanamor also built the jail bars, he knows for sure how to break them open.
How dare Fanamor! Now our town is even more in danger!
Oh but speaking of Fanamor, how is his wife doing? Haven't seen her lately.
Enila, yes, oh there is a story...
Tell me!
Yes, she had a dispute with Lynn the other day.
Oh Enila and Lynn, they are always at loggerheads.
Yes, yes, and Fanamor was very unhappy about Enila.
I can imagine!
Have you ever seen the town at night? It feels... magical.
Rumour says there are treasures hidden in the platonic mountains. But I think it's just more rocks.
If you think a town this small wouldn't need many rules... you'd be wrong. Although it could be a lot worse here.
Oh no, I forgot my keys at home...
[whistling a melody]
My granny taught me this melody. It's an old song from Nor City.
Back in my days, we used to climb that old pine tree. Now it's full of bees. Better not try it.
Birds don’t care what day it is. They just show up and eat. Smart little things.
You learn two things getting old: what matters, and what never did.
Ugh... work never ends.
If you want, you may check out the new hut we finished building in the mountains up there. Or you don't, I'm just glad I don't have to climb this steep hilll ever again.
What a great day to go on a walk through the forests.
You are not from here, are you? If you see a missing chicken, it's probably mine again.
Careful, child. The bushes listen. Especially the pink ones.
If you name your flowers, they behave better. This one here is Gerald.
Oops, I dropped one of my invisible cookies. Well, let it be a snack for the ghost cat.
No, no, not ghosts. Just a ghost cat. His name is... Gar... Garfold or something?
Yesterday I found a perfectly folded sock on the ground. That means something. I just don't know what yet.
Oh, don't mind NAME over there. She is just a little weird sometimes.
What a lovely day it is.
Mmh, those parsnips from Remgard are delicious. You can buy them over there.
Yes, I like them especially when roasted with some carrots. But my husband doesn't...
Well, it's not to everybody's taste.
[chopping wood]

[stops chopping wood]

This will be some nice planks. I think I want to build a cabinet out of it.

[sharpening his axe]

I've had this axe for decades now. But in the past weeks it keeps getting dull again and again.
If my wife asks where I am, tell her that I have to cut down two more trees today.
Lettuce from Remgard! Fresh lettuce and carrots!
Do you want some parsnips? They have been harvested just a week ago.
You look like someone who appreciates a good root vegetable. Do you want to have a look?
Of course. I have a variety of vegetables all growing in and around Remgard. The lake and the sunny mountain side provide many nutrients to the plants.
Oh I see you have an azure gem! May I have it? Pleaseee?

replies.text: Uhm... sure, I don't need it anyways.
Here, I've got five of them. But take care, they are quite rare.
Oh sorry, I want to keep it myself

message: Thank you so much! I've always wanted one. It reminds me of my father's eyes.
Whoa... so many! This is... amazing! I... I feel... oh... [stares at the gems]
Ah! You refuse? I think your gem doesn't like that.
This sword has slain dozens of monsters since it was crafted. I sharpened it last week and it is better than new.
You look like you are in need of a weapon upgrade. Do you want to take a look at my offers?

replies.text: Sure, show me what you have.

message: [Polishing a knife]

replies.text: Do you have anything to trade?

message:
[Puts the knife away]

Sure. Take a look.
Hi there! Fancy some fish?
This fish has been caught yesterday. You should get some before it turns stinky.
I heard that you can catch them around here. But I get my fish from Laeroth. You know, the lake up where Remgard is.

replies.text: Please show me what you have to offer.

message: Fish from Remgard is just the best. Wanna try some?
Sorry, this path is closed due to some heavy rockfalls.
[Reserved for future update]
Heyo young buddy. Ready for an adventure, huh?

replies.text: Yeah! And that cave there will be my next one.
Absolutely. But right, now I just need to get some dead spiders.

message: I would advise you to consider this twice. That cave behind me is full of danger. It's up to you, but I've warned you.
Well, I told you. Do whatever you want. I'm not your dad after all.
Oh you know, there are spiders to be found here indeed. But they are still living. So the cave might be a little... dense.

replies.text: Dense? Well, nothing a good sword can handle.
Oh, nonsense. I've handled much larger caves, this one is a piece of cake to me.

message: You've come back fast. Not much luck, huh?

replies.text: What is going on in there, this can't be normal spiders?

message: A bit bigger they are, but commonly found here and there. I think it is simply the huge amount of them and they've had much time as well covering this cave.

replies.text: A bit bigger than what? I think I'll bail...
I think I can handle them, but how can I even get in there?

message: I see. You are a wise adventurer. Knowing your limits.
Oh, you still wanna try? Well, I'm afraid I can't help you there. I've had my fun with this cave, but I am done here. Just strenghtening up a little and I'll be gone for more adventure.

replies.text: Wait, you have been in this cave? How did you do it?

message: Oh yes, but the spiders have been fast closing it up again. I must admit, I had a little help here and there, but it is of no use anymore.
Okay, see this?

replies.text: That's just a feather! I can get one. I'll be right back...
How would a feather be any help?

message: This is, in fact, a duck's feather. It has been soaked in some mixture that is very corrosive to cobweb.
Yeah, but as I said, it is of no use anymore. The mixture is worn off. I could barely get out of this cave, so it won't be of much use to you anymore.

replies.text: Where can I get another one?

message: That is... I actually don't know. I have bought this on a street market a long time ago. But I remember the seller saying that a very popular alchemist made it. His name was L... Lon... Lob... I forgot...

replies.text: I'm not sure who you are talking about, but I will search for him.
Lodar! I know this guy. I'll be right back...

message: Great! Good luck finding him.
How are you doing, still searching for the feather?
Yeah, well done. Try it now.
Good that you are awake. Stay for a second. That was a close one.
Here, I want to give you those flowers in return. They have a similar value. At least emotional, but I have plenty.
